description: Description of the compute allocation definition.

parameters.name: ComputeQuotaId
parameters.description: ID of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaId
nested_items.description: ID of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: Failure reason of the compute allocation definition.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration of the compute allocation definition. This includes the resource sharing option, and the setting to preempt low priority tasks.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaResources
nested_items.description: Allocate compute resources by instance types.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type of the instance group for the cluster.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The number of instances to add to the instance group of a SageMaker HyperPod cluster.

nested_items.name: ResourceSharingConfig
nested_items.description: Resource sharing configuration. This defines how an entity can lend and borrow idle compute with other entities within the cluster.

nested_items.name: Strategy
nested_items.description: The strategy of how idle compute is shared within the cluster. The following are the options of strategies.
DontLend: entities do not lend idle compute.
Lend: entities can lend idle compute to entities that can borrow.
LendandBorrow: entities can lend idle compute and borrow idle compute from other entities.

nested_items.name: BorrowLimit
nested_items.description: The limit on how much idle compute can be borrowed.The values can be 1 - 500 percent of idle compute that the team is allowed to borrow.

nested_items.name: PreemptTeamTasks
nested_items.description: Allows workloads from within an entity to preempt same-team workloads. When set to LowerPriority, the entity's lower priority tasks are preempted by their own higher priority tasks.

nested_items.name: ComputeQuotaTarget
nested_items.description: The target entity to allocate compute resources to.

nested_items.name: TeamName
nested_items.description: Name of the team to allocate compute resources to.

nested_items.name: FairShareWeight
nested_items.description: Assigned entity fair-share weight. Idle compute will be shared across entities based on these assigned weights. This weight is only used when FairShare is enabled.

nested_items.name: ActivationState
nested_items.description: The state of the compute allocation being described. Use to enable or disable compute allocation.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Creation time of the compute allocation configuration.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Last modified time of the compute allocation configuration.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
